description:
Turn your idea into a product that finds success on the hottest website on the Internet.

Launching on Product Hunt can lead to thousands of new users, downloads and revenue. However, launching on the hottest website on the Internet remains an enigma.

Discover the strategies to make your day on Product Hunt a HUGE success.

You will discover:

  • 3 Things You Must Know About Product Hunt Before Going Live on The Site
  • How to Pitch a Moderator and The Things to Include to Make Their Job Easier
  • The 9-Step Process to Making Your Day on Product Hunt a Huge Success
  • The ONE Thing You Should Never Do on Your Product Hunt Page
  • The Email Scripts I Used to Get a Moderator to Submit a Product
title: The Complete Guide to Product Hunt Success
